::Shredder::

Shredder is slammed against the wall as Megatron's and Waspinator's shots hit 
him. With a scream of pain, he manages to roll a bit to the left, mechfluid 
flowing from his battered chest.

"Megatron!" he yells from where he was now crouching, slightly out of line of 
fire from Megatron, "Hold your fire. We both know that you need equipment. I 
can provide it for you! Scrap metal, parts of scanners, it's all repairable."
